relation: Publisher: Garden City, New York, Doubleday & Company, Inc., 1946., 1946 Garden City, New York, Doubleday & Company, Inc., 1946., 1946. First edition (so stated). Very good. 342 pages. Dust jacket (unclipped). Previous owner's name and address on the front free endpaper. Signed by May Sarton in black ink on the half title page.. Signed by Author(s). 1st Edition. Hardcover. Very Good/Very Good. First edition. Signed.

Publisher: Doubleday & Company, 1946 SARTON, May. THE BRIDGE OF YEARS [A Novel]. New York: Doubleday & Company, 1946. First edition. . A fine copy in good to very good dust jacket; pictorial jacket has two-inch creased tear at crown of spine, with moderate chipping at tips of spine, few short creased tears and nicks to extremities of both panels, else quite bright. . Signed by May Sarton on the title page. Octavo, cloth, 342 pages. First edition. Signed.
George Houle Rare Books & Autographs [United States]
